attributes.action: Part Funded Driving Lessons for Long term Unemployed
attributes.additional_details:
With allot of fields of work being based within out of the way Industrial Estates or New Retail parks Public Transport is not a realistic option for the Early Strart times and Late finishes.

We would like to see part funded driving lessons or CBT training backed with same day Scooter/Moped collection points as opposed to the current system of needing a Job to apply to the current "wheels to work" scheme.

This would open up allot of Work Oppurtunites for those currently depend on Public Transport.
